docs.snippet: A football-related implosion has decimated what was perhaps the nation’s pre-eminent basketball conference....
docs.lead_paragraph: A football-related implosion has decimated what was perhaps the nation’s pre-eminent basketball conference.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column questions whether Big East Conference, which was dominant force in college basketball for decades, can regain prominence on the hardwood; observes conference is slowly recovering from departure of universities that wanted to be affiliated with conferences that played big-time college football.

headline.main: Imagine the Big East, Coast to Coast
headline.print_headline: Imagine the Big East, Coast to Coast

docs.snippet: Stephen F. Austin came within seconds of winning its second major N.C.A.A. tournament upset in its game against Notre Dame. Now its star player, Thomas Walkup, can only lament what almost was....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stephen F. Austin came within seconds of winning its second major N.C.A.A. tournament upset in its game against Notre Dame. Now its star player, Thomas Walkup, can only lament what almost was.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column profiles Stephen F Austin star Thomas Walkup, who shows emotion after team's loss to Notre Dame in final seconds of NCAA tournament game; loss is painful for seniors like Walkup because they will get no second chance at victory.

headline.main: Thomas Walkup Sheds Tears Over What Might Have Been
headline.print_headline: A Lumberjack Sheds Tears for What Almost Was

docs.snippet: Top daily fantasy sports companies FanDuel and DraftKings agreed to halt their business in New York on Monday, betting on a legislative path to make the games legal after a months-long fight with the state's attorney general....
docs.lead_paragraph: Top daily fantasy sports companies FanDuel and DraftKings agreed to halt their business in New York on Monday, betting on a legislative path to make the games legal after a months-long fight with the state's attorney general.

headline.main: FanDuel, DraftKings Shut Down Daily Fantasy Sports Games in New York
headline.print_headline: FanDuel, DraftKings Shut Down Daily Fantasy Sports Games in New York

docs.snippet: The tournament director of the BNP Paribas Open who said women's pro tennis players "ride on the coattails of the men" resigned Monday night, ending his 29-year association with the event....
docs.lead_paragraph: The tournament director of the BNP Paribas Open who said women's pro tennis players "ride on the coattails of the men" resigned Monday night, ending his 29-year association with the event.

headline.main: Tennis Tourney Director Quits After Criticizing Women Pros
headline.print_headline: Tennis Tourney Director Quits After Criticizing Women Pros

docs.snippet: Ahead of the Tampa Bay Rays playing in Havana on Tuesday, a look back at the Baltimore Orioles’ exhibition game against the Cuban national baseball team in 1999....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ahead of the Tampa Bay Rays playing in Havana on Tuesday, a look back at the Baltimore Orioles’ exhibition game against the Cuban national baseball team in 1999.
docs.abstract: Upcoming exhibition game by Tampa Bay Rays against Cuban national baseball team in Havana recalls groundbreaking game Baltimore Orioles played in there in 1999; original competition occurred against backdrop of embargo, and sought to improve relations between countries through sport.

headline.main: When M.L.B. Broke the Ice With a Game in Havana
headline.print_headline: When M.L.B. Broke the Ice With a Game in Havana

docs.snippet: The brothers Denis and Jean Potvin recalled their years helping to build the Islanders’ dynasty in the 1970s and 80s....
docs.lead_paragraph: The brothers Denis and Jean Potvin recalled their years helping to build the Islanders’ dynasty in the 1970s and 80s.
docs.abstract: Former NHL players and brothers Jean and Denis Potvin reflect on their life and legacy with New York Islanders, which started in 1973; Islanders won Stanley Cup each year from 1980 through 1983, period during which Denis was captain.

headline.main: For Potvins, a Chance to Reflect on a Shared Islanders’ Legacy
headline.print_headline: Potvins Reflect on Their Legacy (Garden Chant Is Only Part of It)
